description:
AVAILABLE JUNE 1 2025

Airport Heights

2 bed, 1 bath basement apartment on quiet street in Airport Heights. Apartment gets lots of light with all above ground windows. Includes appliances as seen in photos
Near bus stop and includes 2 vehicle off street parking, separate from upstairs tenants.

Currently rented, will be available June 1

One year lease required
$1500 pou, 75% damage deposit
No smoking, no pets

Must sign 1 year lease

Message if interested. See less See less
